snippet: M.I.T. examines its involvement in the suicide of Aaron Swartz. The post-Golden Globe marketing push by movie studios. Networks revisit conversations about violence.
abstract: M.I.T. examines its involvement in the suicide of Aaron Swartz. The post-Golden Globe marketing push by movie studios. Networks revisit conversations about violence.

headline.main: TimesCast Media+Tech: Suicide Prompts Investigation at M.I.T.
